src_original: idam ucyate maraṇam /  itīdañ ca maraṇam /  pūrvikā ca jarā /  tad ubhayaṃ jarāmaraṇam ity ucyate /
tgt_original: 此死及前說老，是名老死。

src_original: NidSa 16.17 ayam ucyate pratītyasamutpādavibhaṅgaḥ /
tgt_original: 是名緣起義說。

src_original: NidSa 16.18 pratītyasamutpādasya vo ādiñ ca deśayiṣye vibhaṅgañ ca iti me yad uktam idaṃ tat pratyuktam //  Sūtra 17: bhikṣu (Mönch)
tgt_original: 」佛說此經已，諸比丘聞佛所說，歡喜奉行。 299（二九九）如是我聞：

src_original: NidSa 17.1 anyataro bhikṣur yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma /  upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt /  ekāntasthitaḥ sa bhikṣur bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 一時，佛住拘留搜調牛聚落。 時，有異比丘來詣佛所，稽首禮足，退坐一面，白佛言：

src_original: NidSa 17.2 kin nu bhagavatā pratītyasamutpādaḥ kṛta aho svid anyaiḥ /
tgt_original: 「世尊！ 謂緣起法為世尊作，為餘人作耶？

src_original: upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt /  ekāntasthita āyuṣmān sandhākātyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 爾時，尊者𨅖陀迦旃延詣佛所，稽首佛足，退住一面，白佛言： 「世尊！

src_original: NidSa 19.3 samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyagdṛṣṭir iti bhadanta ucyate /
tgt_original: 如世尊說正見。

src_original: kiyatā samyagdṛṣṭir bhavati /
tgt_original: 云何正見？

src_original: kiyatā tathāgataḥ samyagdṛṣtiṃ prajñapayamānaḥ prajñapayati /
tgt_original: 云何世尊施設正見？

src_original: NidSa 19.4 evam ukto bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ sandhākātyāyanam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 」佛告𨅖陀迦旃延：

src_original: NidSa 19.5a dvayaṃ niśrito 'yaṃ kātyāyana loko yad bhūyasāstitāñ ca niśrito nāstitāñ ca /
tgt_original: 「世間有二種依，若有、若無，為取所觸；

src_original: upadhyupādānavinibaddho 'yaṃ kātyāyana loko yad utāstitāñ ca niśrito nāstitāñ ca /  etāni ced upadhyupādānāni cetaso 'dhiṣṭhānābhiniveśānuśayān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśaty ātmā meti /  NidSa 19.5b duḥkham idam utpadyamānam utpadyate /
tgt_original: 取所觸故，或依有、或依無。

src_original: duḥkhaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ nirudhyate /  atra cen na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /  aparapratyayaṃ jñānam evāsya bhavati /  NidSa 19.6 iyatā kātyāyana samyagdṛṣṭir bhavati /  iyatā tathāgataḥ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prajñapaymānaḥ prajñapayati /
tgt_original: 若無此取者，心境繫著使不取、不住、不計我苦生而生，苦滅而滅，於彼不疑、不惑，不由於他而自知，是名正見，是名如來所施設正見。

src_original: NidSa 19.7 tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: lokasamudayaṃ kātyāyana yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā paśyato yā loke nāstitā sā na bhavati /  lokanirodhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā paśyato yā loke 'stitā sā na bhavati /  NidSa 19.8 ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamya madhyamayā pratipadā tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati /  NidSa 19.9 yad utāsmin satīdaṃ bhavaty asyotpādād idam utpadyate /  yad utāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti pūrvavad yāvat samudayo nirodhaś ca bhavati /
tgt_original: 世間集如實正知見，若世間無者不有，世間滅如實正知見，若世間有者無有，是名離於二邊說於中道，所謂此有故彼有，此起故彼起，謂緣無明行，乃至純大苦聚集，無明滅故行滅，乃至純大苦聚滅。

src_original: NidSa 19.10 asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇa āyuṣmataḥ sandhākātyāyanasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam /  Sūtra 20: acela (Nacktgänger)
tgt_original: 」佛說此經已，尊者𨅖陀迦旃延聞佛所說，不起諸漏，心得解脫，成阿羅漢。 302（三〇二）如是我聞：

src_original: NidSa 20.1 bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati gṛdhrakūṭe parvate /
tgt_original: 一時，佛住王舍城耆闍崛山。

src_original: NidSa 20.2 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya gṛdhrakūṭaparvatād avatīrṇo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat /
tgt_original: 爾時，世尊晨朝著衣持鉢，出耆闍崛山，入王舍城乞食。

src_original: NidSa 20.3 tena khalu samayenācelakāśyapo rājagṛhaṃ gocarāya prasṛto 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena /  adrākṣīd acelakāśyapo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva /
tgt_original: 時，有阿支羅迦葉為營小事，出王舍城，向耆闍崛山，遙見世尊。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma /  upetya bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 見已，詣佛所，白佛言：

src_original: NidSa 20.4 pṛcchāma bho gautama kañcid eva pradeśam /  saced avakāśaṃ kuryāt praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 「瞿曇！ 欲有所問，寧有閑暇見答與不？

src_original: NidSa 20.5 akālas tāvat tava kāśyapa praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉：

src_original: rājagṛhaṃ tāvat piṇḍāya caritavyam /  bahir ārāmaṃ gaccha /  tatra te kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /  NidSa 20.6 dvir apy evam eva vācyam /
tgt_original: 「今非論時，我今入城乞食，來還則是其時，當為汝說。

src_original: NidSa 20.7 trir apy acelakāśyapo bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 」第二亦如是說，第三復問：

src_original: syād bho gautamāsmākaṃ vāntarāyo bhavati gautamasyānyathātvam /  ihaiva vayaṃ bhavantaṃ gautamaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ /
tgt_original: 「瞿曇！ 何為我作留難？ 瞿曇！ 云何有異？

src_original: saced avakāśaṃ kuryāḥ praśnasya vyākaraṇāya /  NidSa 20.8 pṛccha kāśyapa yad yad evākāṅkṣase /
tgt_original: 我今欲有所問，為我解說。 」佛告阿支羅迦葉： 「隨汝所問。 」阿支羅迦葉白佛言： 「云何？

src_original: NidSa 20.9a kin nu bho gautama svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 瞿曇！ 苦自作耶？ 」佛告迦葉：

src_original: avyākṛtam idaṃ mayā kāśyapa svayaṃkṛtaṃ duḥkham /
tgt_original: 「苦自作者，此是無記。 」迦葉復問：

src_original: kin nu bho gautama nāsty eva duḥkham /
tgt_original: 」「今無此苦耶？

src_original: NidSa 20.11 na kāśyapa nāsty eva duḥkham iti tv asty eva duḥkham /
tgt_original: 」佛告迦葉： 「非無此苦，然有此苦。 」迦葉白佛言： 「善哉！

src_original: NidSa 20.12 sādhu me bhavān gautamas tathā dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jāneyaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśyeyam /
tgt_original: 瞿曇！ 說有此苦，為我說法，令我知苦見苦。
